comments.content:
(Hairlines on hairlines...)   
It's some Didot or other.   
   
hhp

tsk. tsk Hrant ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018111920im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) It is very Didot, until you look at that 'Q'. HTF 96pt has severe serifs like that as well.

by the way what's the meaning of 'acqua'? water?   
   
+ep+

Right. The word 'acqua' come from latin language and means water.   
   
Friendly,
